display_long_description:
**Sword fight with killer robots in VR! 
Watch as limbs fly off from a single cut of your energy blade!**

You are Blink, a teleporting robot who is the newest “looprunner” gladiator to compete in the Crashloop, a deadly roguelike tournament to the death. 

[media]

Die and reawaken in an endless loop, leap over lava pools, avoid turret fire, and take down waves of enemy defendroids.

[media]

**Battle your fellow looprunners for a chance to fight the Captain in the Hyperdome.** In between runs, get to know the other looprunners and learn the secrets of Crashloop. Take sides in their rivalries. Let your sword do the talking to win their favor.

[media]

**Defeat other looprunners to claim their Turbofists!** Shoot flames, launch shurikens, slow time, summon zombies and more! Upgrade the turbofists with power from other defeated looprunners to become unstoppable.

[media]

**Swing lots of different weapons to find your favorite style.** Two handed spears, a katana, an axe and shield? If you’re daring, fight with your bare metal fists!

[media]

**Feel the power of voxel destruction. Learn to wield your laser sword.** 

**The Hyperdome awaits!**


[media]
